name: Retro Edge
description:
In a galaxy, not that far away... a lone intergalactic cargo vessel is traveling across space...

Only two crew members, the Captain and his devoted companion, are in charge of the ship, so they have a lot on their hands. Hostile extraterrestrials and their outposts makes it extremely dangerous in these regions of the Nebula. But nonetheless, the crew is ready and prepared for everything.

* * *

A small survival-based adventure game with a spooky, unsettling vibe.

Make sure the passage is free of alien presence as the ship is getting ready for the Hyper-Jump, by taking control of a little fighter jet that you may enhance by gathering resources and doing various other tasks. 

You will also be able to explore the ship and try out other fun retro-based mini games like "Arkanoid" and "Tetris".

* * *

The game is still in active development, so all of the feedback is very much appreciated!

Have Fun!
